title: Supported Access Levels/Challenge Keys
description: A description all of the supported access levels (associated with challenge keys)

default.Description: The access description to use when no challenge key is provided

levels.Description: The supported access levels and associated challenge keys

name.Description: A unique name for the access level

challengeKey.Description: The key which must be used to connect with this access level

accessDescription.Description: The features supported by this access level
